title: What are some lies that becomes necessary than the truth? - Quora

response.answer_text: A lie that can rebuild a person are better than truths. If edison’s mother would have told him the truth about his school’s letter, he would not have been such a great scientist. If telling a lie makes a person survive or sparks the light of hope in him, it is much better than truth.

How would you feel if you told a lie instead of the truth to someone? Would it bother you even if you thought the truth was something that would be distressing for that person? When the person learned the truth, how would you feel then?
